name: Orca
description: Using cutting edge technology, ORCA allows food waste to be treated on site at the source through the use of aerobic digestion, reducing the need to store food waste or having food waste sent to the landfill or incinerators. Catering for all business sizes and volumes of food waste with the smallest unit no bigger than a washing maching.
